Class BinaryRecordInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.record.BinaryRecordInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordInput
    Deprecated. 
    Replaced by Avro.

    @Deprecated
@InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public class BinaryRecordInput
extends Object
implements RecordInput
